projects.subtitle: Development
projects.title: dev-www.42mate.com
projects.textExplaining: My first job was create a new from scratch page for the 42mate site with a new fresh style and design. Doing the most part of the backend and the frontend. Nowdays the project is in stand by, waiting for someone to transfer all the original content from the original site to this new site. The site is 100% usable and functional! (Just we need more workers LoL!)
